reviewText: Arrived on time.  I'm sure these movies are just as terrible as the ex I bought them for.
I bought this package becasue i had seen Fluke many years ago, and wanted to see it again and have my children watch it.
Samuel Jackson a voice in this touching tale of a puppy dog going home to say goodby to his family and a spare thrown in was lovely too.hope I did not mix them up a Great family movie Pair

I first watched this on tape with my young grandson.  Showing the spirit rise as a spark when someone died was such a clear way to teach young people an well as us older folks in "fluke"
'"Far From Home" showed the strength if human?animal connection and the endurance of the trip home and the kindness of others to the  dog.

Saw a portion of Fluke one day, but came in on the middle of it. Could only find a copy at a reasonable price on amazon. Thank you amazon. A heart warming story with a interesting twist. I liked it, and the kiddie's can watch it ,too.
If you like dogs and feel good adventure movies (Fluke is especially good for the Xmas viewing list) then these are two must see movies. Double feature on two DVD - great bargain. SBJ
